data.text: Jisu'n Biak-inn mathaanna asi phakhan, asiamruoi ngai'n insak innjarra amadiang minmunasik ah akoolla inheiwa.
“Oh,”Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni'n hiwa rakip ngaihi mumak chube? Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiti eii, lung khatbit um lung inkhat chungnga omnuni; inraja ah la-inlet wiaksik eii.”

Jisu'n Olives Chingnga in-ongnga omlai, siamruoi ngai'n ruuk ah amadiang inheiwa ah inleiti. “Hiwa rakip ngaihi angtik asuoksik me,” “halli nang najuonasik li manmasituol hekna jetnasik, keinidiang natipiro.”
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Insingtheiru, tu-inkhat innum nangni innaminweet maknasik.
Ajarchu mi katam khat in karamingnga, Kei Messiah ka-eii! ti-inta inheiwasik eii; halli mi katam khat kha aminweet sik eii.
Nangni'n raal khat-um raalchong rasa akanai khat-um akalaak ah ninglajetsik eii, takkha chimaru; ajarchu hiwa rakip hi alasuoksik eii, takkha ahekna kha tuunkatung lahongmak.
Ajarchu ramkhat li ramkhat inla-insuolsik eii, halli rengram khat li rengram khat inla-inthatsik eii; halli amun rakip ah bukawaang li rinook alasuoksik eii.
Hiwa rakip hi naiha kahong ma-insa kha ka-ang eii.”
“Halli nangni nasur inta minpoong nasik innalapesik eii, halli nangni innalathatsik eii, halli zaat rakip in kei jarra nangni innamatir sik eii. Matt 10:22
Halli khawa phakhan akatamkhat in la-inngamna nunu, halli inmani inkhat li inkhat inla-inpesuoksik eii, halli inkhat li khat inla-intirsik eii.
Halli akatuunmak Pathian chongkachoi angjet lahongsuok inta mi akatamkhat alaminweetsik eii.
Hiwa ka-ang akathamak ahongkheel jarra, minriang hi mi katamtak ngai chungnga ajuotoom sik eii.
Takkha ahekna katungnga kadei ama kha aringsik eii. Matt 10:22
Halli hiwa Rengram jarra Chong Kahoi hi phungle zaat rakip ah sakhi enasik ah manmasituol pumpuiya inlarilsik eii; halli ahekna kha ajotungsik eii.
“Khawa jarra Pathian chongkachoi Daniel diangnga ileiminril, kaminmang mator ‘Chikaompa’ khan inthiang munna ingir nangni'n ningmusik eii.” (Akateel ama khan jetrase!) Dan 9:27; 11:31; 12:11
“Khawa phakhan tuka-ang Judea ah kaom rakip in chingtiang taanrasu.”
Tuka-ang innchungnga kaom ama khan innsuungnga kaom phur ngaikha kakeisuosik juochum khaimarase; Luk 17:31
halli tuka-ang leiya kaom ama khan apuonsil kaleisik heikir khaimarase.
Halli nai kalawon numeisa ngaisik khat-um nainu ngai sik achu khawa phakha angtuk poongkaom sikme!
Phanbi emakli Jihudi ngai sernikhuoni ningtaan maknasik Pathian diang niru!
Ajarchu khawa phakha manmasituol inphut makheiya awini katung lakasuokmak, halli angtikniteii um kasuok khaimaksik poongna kalok khetkha esik eii. Dan 12:1; Chonglar 7:14
Takkha Pathian'n nikhuo ngaikha amintoomjei; kha emak inchu manmasi tu inkhat um ringthei nunu; takkha ama ikadang mi-ngai sikbit ah khawa nikhuo ngaikha Pathian in aminbongsik eii.
“Khawa pha takkhan, ‘Enru, hiwahin emakli khawakhan Messiah kha aom!’ tuka-ang inkhat in nangni diang ati inchu ngamnamaru.”

Ajarchu Christa inleem khat-um Pathian Chongkahoi inleem ngai inlahong suoksik eii, halli ethei-inchu, ikadang mi ngai katung matheemna machulnasik ah, chuon inlak li ngaksik kaom angjet ngaikha inlathosik eii.
Rangairu! kei'n nangni diang apha matiang kinatipi ejei.
“Emakli, mi ngai'n nangni diang, ‘Enru, ama neelramma aom inti inchu!’ khawakhan juosi maru, halli ‘Enro, ama hin inthup ah om inti innum!’ ngamnamaru.” Luk 17:23,24
Ajarchu Miring Sapa kha nisuotiangnga kool-inlek kha niluutna tiang katung inmu kha angnga alajuosik eii.
“Kathi kaluong omna munkhan laangkia ngai ininchunsik eii.” Luk 17:37

“Poongraalna nikhuo ngai hekli hekmak innot ah kani'n ahongziing sik eii, tha in ama ra-ang penunijei, arsi ngai'n marwaanna inphut injuotasik eii, halli marwaanna ranak rakip um intuulsik eii; Isa 13:10; Jo 2:10,31; Chonglar 6:12; Ezek 32:7

halli khawa phakhan lairalak ah Miring Sapa madanna kha inlarsik eii; halli manmasituolla zaat rakip in inlachapsik eii, khat-um ranak le alur-alianna khale inruoiya Miring Sapa khan suumphai chungnga ijuo kha inmani'n inmusik eii.” Dan 7:13; Zech 12:10-14; Chonglar 1:7

Tampalooi rasa inringkha inlatumsik eii, halli ama'n ama marwaan tirton ngaikha neipilchung raki miliya atirsik eii, khat-um ama ikadang neipilchung pumpuiya kaom mingaikha inmani ngai'n inheikhoom chunsik eii.
“Tuun nangni'n theichang kuungnga inphut chongminkhi inkhat hi inchuru; aziik kadoongkha ahongcherra abuo hongsuokjei inchu, nangni'n kholumpha ahongnaijei tia ningjet.”
Kha angnga nangni'n hiwarakip hi ningmu phakhan, apha anaijei, ama kotkuung juotungjei, ti nangni'n ningjetsik eii. 24:33. Apha anai jei, tinachu ama ajuo sik ejei tina eii
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiti eii, hiwarakip hi asuok maklaiseng hiwa khang hi laheknuni.
Marwaan li nuoipil chu lamangsik eii, takkha kei kachong ngaichu angtikniteii mangnuni.
“Khawa nikhuo li aphakha kapa eleiya, marwaan tirton ngai innum, Sapa innum,24:36. manuscript lekkhat achu ommak Sapa innum  tu inkhat innum jetmu.”
Ajarchu Noah pha khanna angme kasuok angnga, Miring Sapa kajuo kha um khale in-angsik eii. Inphut 6:5-8
Ajarchu khawa tuikalian matiang khan, Noah in rakuong aluut maklaiseng, mi ngaikhan inbak inin, moi inleiruoi khat-um moiruoi nasik inleitho;
tuikalian kha ajuo ah inmani rakip achoi maklaiseng angme kasuok inmani injetmak kha angnga, Miring Sapa kha ajuo pha khannum kha angnga asuoksik eii. Inphut 7:6-24
Khawa phakhan leiya miring inni chuon inthosik eii; inkhat kha aruoisik eii, halli inkhat kha adasik eii.
Numeisa inni chakari intak ah in-omsik eii; inkhat in aruoisik eii, halli inkhat kha adasik eii.
Khawa jarra insingtheiru, ajarchu nangni Pumi kha angtikni ajuosikme nangni'n jetmakchu.
Halli hiwahi jetru, angtikni innruppa'n aheiwa sikme ti innmapupa'n ajet inchu, ama'n inringchakta, halli a-inn kha innruuppa khan leimakoi matornuni. Luk 12:39-40
Hiwajarra nangni um inringchakru, ajarchu ningngaidon makna phatak khan Miring Sapa kha ajuosik eii.
“Kha e-inchu, tume aphakacha ah innmapupa in inmani diang baksik kapesik ithun ngamna kaom khat-um akasing suok kha?”
Amapupa'n inna aheikir pha hiwa ngai kathoa kaom jo-intongpui suok ama kha rawaan katha eii!
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kati, ama'n ineirakip kha asuokpa diang aminhuumsik eii.
Takkha ama akathamak suok kha e-inchu, ama atheinuo ah intisik eii, kamapupa chu lahongwak nuni,
halli ama'n asuok changpui ngaikha kawuok khat-um ju inrui ngaile kabak khat-um ka-in aphutsik ejei.
Halli suok mapupa kha suokpa khan angaidon makna phakhan ahongkirsik eii, halli ama'n aphakha jetnuni.
Amapupa in ama kha abong bongnga atansik eii, halli nunchan katha inleem ngai rasi-enna tumkha ama'n amusik eii; khawakhan chapli hakarialna esik eii.
